document_data.name: Sea Tower
document_data.mainbody: The '''Sea Tower''' was a fortress in the city of [[Tantras]] in [[the Vast]]. It was the base of the [[Guard (Tantras)|Guard]] of Tantras.
document_data.Location: The Sea Tower stood on the city's coast, on the southern side of the opening of the bay. It lay at the end of [[Whistleturn Way]].
document_data.Activities: The Sea Tower was the city's main fortress, and held armories and training areas for soldiers.
